英文法規名稱: Regulations Governing Prior Release of Commodities
沿革內容:
1.Adopted and promulgated by Ministerial Order on 9 January 2002.
2.Amended and promulgated by Ministerial Order on 31 December 2003.
3.Amended and promulgated by Ministerial Order on 26 September 2006.
4.Amended and promulgated by Ministerial Order on 18 November 2009.

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations are established in accordance with Paragraph 3 of Article 7 of the Commodity Inspection Act (the Act).

The ‘inspection authority’ mentioned in these Regulations refers to the Bureau of Standards, Metrology and Inspection of the Ministry of Economic Affairs (the BSMI), its branches, or other commissioned government agencies, legal entities or organizations. The ‘applicant’ mentioned in these Regulations refers to the manufacturer, exporter, importer or sales agent who is obligated to apply for inspection of the commodities involved.

The applicant shall submit an application for prior release to the inspection authority by submitting a completed application form and related documents. The approval letter from the BSMI mentioned in Paragraph 2 of Article 3 or Paragraph 2 of Article 4 shall also be attached, where applicable.

The inspection authority may review and issue a prior-release notice to a qualified applicant after the review. and, notify the applicant as such.
The inspection authority may first transmit the preceding notice electronically to the customs authorities.
These Regulations shall take effect upon the date of promulgation.
